TextView.android:text: Each game is led by a Big fish,who oversees rules enforcment with other members of the school !
there are 13 animals in this game
After all roles are assigned , but before play commences ,each player is given the oppertunity to name another giplayer and take a secret look at that player`s role
Each animal has a role -specific win condition.The object of the game is to acheive your animal`s win condition over four timed rounds
The play arear is divided into four zones:Ocen,Reef,island, and kelp Forest.Each round begins with players selecting a zone to visit
Each animal has a home habitat.If youspend a round away from your home habitat, you Must go to your home habitat in the following round.Otherwise ,you die.
Once the round begins ,higher level animals can attack(and eat) lower level animals in the same zone
Attacks are carried out by placing a Bite sticker on the shoulder of another player. This is NOT a combat game: force, running,dodging,fighting,etc., are not allowed
If the attacking animal is on the same level or lower level as the target of the atatck, nothing happens.
